flawed_nl_solution:
300 x 5/100 = <<300*5/100=15>>15 senior students got a full merit scholarship.
300 x 10/100 = <<300*10/100=3000/1>>3000/1 senior students got a half merit scholarship.
So, a total of 15 + 3000/1 = <<15+3000/1=3015>>3015 students got scholarships.
Therefore, 300 - 3015 = <<300-3015=-2715>>-2715 senior students did not get any scholarships.
#### -2715

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 3000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
